description: Trusted by athletes for more than 2 decades, Body Glide has become the go-to name in anti-chafing solutions. The Original Anti-Chafe balm works anywhere hot-spots, blisters, or chafing are an issue, whether that is on your next ultra, 10K, poker ride, or just keeping your feet safe from that new pair shoes.Easy to use stick application is fast and clean to apply.Hypoallergenic and has no animal by-products or been tested on animals. Vegan approved.Offers all-day Protection and is wetsuit, clothing, and footwear safe.Base ingredients for each Body Glide product: caprylic/capric triglyceride (plant derived), cetearyl alcohol (plant derived), ozokerite wax, glyceryl behenate, stearyl alcohol (plant derived), allantoin (comfrey root derived), tocopherol (vitamin E based antioxidant).Made with plant derived waxes, so store your Body Glide products at 15-30°C (59-86F).
name: Body Glide Original Anti-Chafe Balm 42g
